trans-unit.source: Extract and Parse Structured Objects out of String
trans-unit.target: 從字串擷取和剖析結構化物件

trans-unit.source: This also introduces some additional functionality for the ConvertFrom-String cmdlet:
trans-unit.target: 本主題也將介紹 ConvertFrom-String Cmdlet 的一些額外功能︰

trans-unit.source: Removes the extent text property by default.
trans-unit.target: 預設情況下會移除範圍文字屬性，

trans-unit.source: You can include it with the -IncludeExtent parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 IncludeExtent 參數將此屬性加入。

trans-unit.source: Many learning algorithm bug fixes from MVP and community feedback.
trans-unit.target: 許多 MVP 和社群意見反應的學習演算法 Bug 修正。

trans-unit.source: A new -UpdateTemplate parameter to save the results of the learning algorithm into a comment in the template file.
trans-unit.target: 新的 -UpdateTemplate 參數，可將學習演算法的結果儲存成範本檔案中的註解，

trans-unit.source: This makes the learning process (the slowest stage) a one-time cost.
trans-unit.target: 使得學習程序 (最慢的階段) 成為單次成本。

trans-unit.source: Running Convert-String with a template that contains the encoded learning algorithm is now nearly instantaneous.
trans-unit.target: 現在使用包含已編碼學習演算法的範本，幾乎可以瞬間執行 Convert-String。

trans-unit.source: Extract and parse structured objects out of string content
trans-unit.target: 從字串內容擷取和剖析結構化物件

trans-unit.source: In collaboration with [Microsoft Research](http://research.microsoft.com/), a new **ConvertFrom-String** cmdlet has been added.
trans-unit.target: 在與 [Microsoft Research](http://research.microsoft.com/) 合作之下，已新增 **ConvertFrom-String** Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports two modes: basic delimited parsing, and auto generated example-driven parsing.
trans-unit.target: 這個 Cmdlet 支援兩種模式︰基本的分隔剖析和自動產生的範例驅動剖析。

trans-unit.source: Delimited parsing, by default, splits the input at white space, and assigns property names to the resulting groups.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，分隔的剖析將輸入從空白字元位置分割，並將屬性名稱指派給產生的群組。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the delimiter:
trans-unit.target: 您可以自訂分隔符號︰

trans-unit.source: >> "Hello World" | ConvertFrom-String | Format-Table -Auto
trans-unit.target: >> "Hello World" | ConvertFrom-String | Format-Table -Auto

trans-unit.source: P1 P2
trans-unit.target: P1 P2

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet also supports auto-generated example-driven parsing based on the [FlashExtract](http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/people/sumitg/flashextract.html) research work in [Microsoft Research](http://research.microsoft.com).
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 也會根據 [Microsoft Research](http://research.microsoft.com) 中的 [FlashExtract](http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/people/sumitg/flashextract.html) 研究工作，支援自動產生範例驅動剖析。

trans-unit.source: To get started, consider a text-based address book:
trans-unit.target: 若要開始，請考慮使用以文字為基礎的通訊錄︰

trans-unit.source: Copy a few examples into a file, which you will use as your template:
trans-unit.target: 將幾個範例複製到要作為範本使用的檔案中︰

trans-unit.source: Put curly braces around data that you want to extract, giving it a name as you do so.
trans-unit.target: 以大括號括住您想要擷取的資料，在這麼做的時候，提供一個名稱。

trans-unit.source: Because the **Name** property (and its associated other properties) can appear multiple times, use an asterisk (\*) to indicate that this results in multiple records (rather than extracting a bunch of properties into one record):
trans-unit.target: 因為 **Name** 屬性 (和與其相關聯的其他屬性) 可以出現多次，所以請使用星號 (\*)，表示這會產生多筆記錄 (而非將一大堆內容擷取成一個記錄)︰

trans-unit.source: From this set of examples, **ConvertFrom-String** can now automatically extract object-based output from input files with similar structure.
trans-unit.target: 在這組範例中，**ConvertFrom-String** 現在可以自動從輸入檔擷取具類似結構、以物件為基礎的輸出。

trans-unit.source: >> Get-Content .\\addresses.output.txt | ConvertFrom-String -TemplateFile .\\addresses.template.txt |
trans-unit.target: >> Get-Content .\\addresses.output.txt | ConvertFrom-String -TemplateFile .\\addresses.template.txt |

trans-unit.source: >>> Format-Table -Auto
trans-unit.target: >>> Format-Table -Auto

trans-unit.source: ExtentText Name City State
trans-unit.target: ExtentText Name City State

trans-unit.source: Ana Trujillo... Ana Trujillo Redmond WA
trans-unit.target: Ana Trujillo... Ana Trujillo Redmond WA

trans-unit.source: Antonio Moreno... Antonio Moreno Renton WA
trans-unit.target: Antonio Moreno... Antonio Moreno Renton WA

trans-unit.source: Thomas Hardy... Thomas Hardy Seattle WA
trans-unit.target: Thomas Hardy... Thomas Hardy Seattle WA

trans-unit.source: Christina Berglund... Christina Berglund Redmond WA
trans-unit.target: Christina Berglund... Christina Berglund Redmond WA

trans-unit.source: Hanna Moos... Hanna Moos Puyallup WA
trans-unit.target: Hanna Moos... Hanna Moos Puyallup WA

trans-unit.source: To do additional data manipulation on extracted text, the **ExtentText** property captures the raw text from which the record was extracted.
trans-unit.target: 若要在擷取的文字上執行其他資料操作，**ExtentText** 屬性可從擷取記錄中擷取未經處理的文字。

trans-unit.source: To provide feedback on this feature, or to share content for which you are having difficulty writing examples, please email <psdmfb@microsoft.com>.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供這項功能的意見反應，或共用您在撰寫時遇到困難的範例內容，請寄電子郵件至 <psdmfb@microsoft.com>。
